title: An efficient β-nucleating agent with high lattice matching rate for plate-like crystallization of polypropylene random copolymer
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,11584-11593
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA08484A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Bo Wu, Xian Zheng, Yanwei Ren, Hailong Yu, Haiqiang Leng, Yubo Wang, Huanfeng Jiang
The highly ordered structure of β-nucleating agent, the periodicity of 12.89 Å, can act as growth surface, which induces PP molecular chain epitaxial to crystallize on it and many irregular plate-like β crystalline regions are formed eventually.
